songs.lyrics:
Yeah! Yama!

[Verse 1]
Hami ho allarey thita
Kamaune sapana majjale bita
Agadi chha dasha tyehi falame bhitta
Tara ke majja chha rah nahari jitda
Charai tira chha yaha raksi ko barsa
[?] yo padka
Agadi pachadi [?] kapda
Harek bihani beluki masti rah lafada
[?] pari yo duichaar patak
Nahuda hariyo goti kha rah chatak
Aama rah ba jahiley ghar ma darshak
Tyesaile jhyap ma ghar jadina [?]
Majja thyo yesai nai hallida
Balboro hunna thyo ek paisa khalti ma
Sadhai nai masti ma, chyyang khana bhattima
Yestai nai thyo yaha chalanchaltima

[Chorus] x2
Ma hun Nepalko thito
Mero para nai chha bhinna
Majhi aula aakashtira kaslai baal dinna
Kathmandu ko thito mero saili nai chha bhinna
Majhi aula aakashtira kasailai ni baal dinna

[Verse 2]
Bikema tolthau bajaar ghumdai
Hiphop geet speaker ma bajayera sundai
Man bhitra sapana hajarau bundai
[?] padkayera uddai
Chapkiko ghar muni lachito puginthyo
Isaara haru ni lachito bujinthyo
Din hos ya raatma ni phone ma jhundiyo
[?] stoned nai hunthiyo
Rahar chha banne yo sahar ko raaja
Dhokera [?] mahal ma raaja
Bokera sapana man ko maajha
Gardaichhu ladera sangharsha ma aaja
Chhu ma badhdai aghi
Pratispardha sabai todhdai pachi
[?] gharma kordai masi
Sakchhu tanna sabai boko khasi

[Chorus] x2
Ma hun Nepalko thito
Mero para nai chha bhinna
Majhi aula aakashtira kaslai baal dinna
Kathmandu ko thito mero saili nai chha bhinna
Majhi aula aakashtira kasailai ni baal dinna
songs.title: Allarey Thita
